fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel

Class GaussianKernel<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.Kernel<T>
      • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.GaussianKernel<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Data type of input space
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleGaussChi1, DoubleGaussChi2, DoubleGaussL2, DoubleTriangleL2, GaussianICKernel, IndexDoubleGaussChi2, IndexDoubleGaussL2, IntGaussChi1, IntGaussChi2, IntGaussL2

    public abstract class GaussianKernel<T>
extends Kernel<T>

    Base class for Gaussian Kernels in the form of k(x1, x2) = exp(-gamme * dist(x1, x2))

    The distance used if defined in specific subclasses.

    Author:
    picard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
